special_text:
Compete [i](At the end of each of combat, you get a score counter for each opponent you attacked this turn. Spend six score counters as a sorcery to create Trophy tokens.)[/i]
[+1]: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.
[-1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. Choose any number permanents and/or players other than Seto San, then give each another counter of each kind already there.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Artifacts you control have ‘{3}, {T}: This artifact deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.'”
